params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.max_failures_per_hour
params.description: Optional. Maximum number of times per hour a driver may be restarted as a result of driver terminating with non-zero code before job is reported failed. A job may be reported as thrashing if driver exits with non-zero code 4 times within 10 minute window. Maximum value is 10.

methods.name: getMaxFailuresPerHour
methods.description:
Optional. Maximum number of times per hour a driver may be restarted as a result of driver terminating with non-zero code before job is reported failed.

A job may be reported as thrashing if driver exits with non-zero code 4 times within 10 minute window. Maximum value is 10.

Generated from protobuf field int32 max_failures_per_hour = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];
